Privacy Policy

Welcome to our app! We value your privacy and want to be transparent about how we collect, use, and protect your data. This privacy policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and your choices regarding your data.

Registration

Our registration process requires you to provide only a username and password of your choice. We do not require any email, phone number, or other personal sensitive information.

Data Collection

We only collect movement counts and dates. We do not collect any location data or personal information. We do not store any sensitive information about you.

Data Storage

Please note that data collected is not encrypted and is stored in a public database. However, we take all reasonable precautions to protect your data and ensure its security.

Data Deletion

If you choose to delete your account, all records associated with your username will be entirely deleted from our database. We do not retain any of your data after account deletion.

Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy or the use of your data, please feel free to contact us at deveyra.j.bsinfotech@gmail.com.

Thank you for trusting us with your data. Your privacy is important to us, and we are committed to protecting it.
